column1: Table 60. Percent distribution of incidents, by type of crime, type of offender and time of occurrence
data source: National Criminal Victimization Survey, 2005  NCJ 215244
authors:  Patsy Klaus and Cathy Maston
Table 60. Personal robbery and assault by armed or unarmed offenders, 2005: Percent distribution of incidents, by type of crime, type of offender and time of occurrence
Note: Detail may not add to total shown because of rounding.
Excludes data in which the presence of a weapon was not ascertained.
*Estimate is based on about 10 or fewer sample cases.
